mapper.insert: insert into Qna (title, date, viewnum, writer, qna_type, content, is_answered) values (#{title}, #{date}, #{viewnum}, #{writer}, #{qna_type}, #{content}, #{is_answered})
mapper.select: select * from Qna order by id desc
select Customer.customer_Name from Qna, Customer where Qna.writer = Customer.customer_Index order by Qna.id desc
select customer_Id from Qna, Customer where Qna.writer = Customer.customer_Index and Qna.id = #{qna_Id}
